v.v: Yahweh, I am crying out to you; come quickly to me.
May my prayer be like incense before you;
Yahweh, place a guard over my mouth;
Do not let my heart desire any evil thing
Let a righteous man hit me; it will be a kindness to me.
Their leaders will be thrown down from the top of cliffs;
They will have to say, “As when one plows and breaks up the ground,
Surely my eyes are on you, Yahweh, Lord;
Protect me from the snares that they have laid for me,
Let the wicked fall into their own nets

v: Listen to me when I call to you.
may my lifted hands be like the evening sacrifice.
guard the door of my lips.
May I not eat any of their delicacies.
Let him correct me; it will be like oil on my head;
may my head not refuse to accept it.
But my prayer is always against their wicked deeds.
they will hear that my own words are pleasant.
so our bones have been scattered at the mouth of Sheol.”
in you I take refuge; do not leave my soul defenseless.
